name: com.squirrelbytes.domi.contacts
description:
Domi Contacts provides fast, low-overhead body contact events for Unity.

It implements a high-locality dispatch pipeline where listeners are resolved via compact body-pair keyed dictionaries. This keeps event delivery predictable, cache-friendly, and eliminates duplicate Enter/Exit spam.

It avoids GetComponent, tags, and scene queries by design, enabling typed, direct consumption paths for component-level handling.

Built on Unity’s ContactPair API, it emits a single stable Enter/Exit stream per Rigidbody body-pair, with deterministic registration and explicit lifecycle control owned by the user.
